com.github.mikephil.charting.interfaces.datasets

Interface ICandleDataSet

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IBarLineScatterCandleBubbleDataSet<CandleEntry>, IDataSet<CandleEntry>, ILineScatterCandleRadarDataSet<CandleEntry>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CandleDataSet

    public interface ICandleDataSet
extends ILineScatterCandleRadarDataSet<CandleEntry>
    Created by philipp on 21/10/15.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      float getBarSpace()
      Returns the space that is left out on the left and right side of each candle.
      int getDecreasingColor()
      Returns the decreasing color (for open > close).
      android.graphics.Paint.Style getDecreasingPaintStyle()
      Returns paint style when open > close
      int getIncreasingColor()
      Returns the increasing color (for open < close).
      android.graphics.Paint.Style getIncreasingPaintStyle()
      Returns paint style when open < close
      int getNeutralColor()
      Returns the neutral color (for open == close)
      int getShadowColor()
      Returns shadow color for all entries
      boolean getShadowColorSameAsCandle()
      Is the shadow color same as the candle color?
      float getShadowWidth()
      Returns the width of the candle-shadow-line in pixels.
      boolean getShowCandleBar()
      Returns whether the candle bars should show? When false, only "ticks" will show - default: true
